channel.title: [PI] Command Help
channel.description:
Hello Everyone,
I am trying to make a command that when you type it, it gives the item, and removes a set ammount of pk points.
Example:
Player Types: ::dharoks
They recieve Dharoks, and lose 200 Pkp
Thanks Everyone, Rep ++ as always

item.title: [PI] Command Help
item.dc:creator: @aquikzebra aquikzebra
item.description:
@aquikzebra wrote:

Im kinda confused about it myself…

Do you think if I give you my source files, you could figure it out? I really need this fixed :rolleyes:

I got 42 players on, waiting for an update

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Command Help
item.dc:creator: @4markie 4markie
item.description:
@4markie wrote:

[quote=“aquikzebra, post:27, topic:396827”][quote author=4markie link=topic=493989.msg3611660#msg3611660 date=1306636728]

I do, but my dropbox say’s I haven’t changed it in over 2 months

Can you try it and see if using that one will fix it?
[/quote]

Yea, I tried, still got 100 errors

I also noticed another error at the top: http://prntscr.com/1ydxd

Would you just like the source files?[/quote]

Hm that’s extremely strange, there has to be something you did, things dont just happen by themselves.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Command Help
item.dc:creator: @4markie 4markie
item.description:
@4markie wrote:

By looking at your files I have found the problem

change c.pk-points to c.pkPoints
change sM to c.sendMessage

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Command Help
item.dc:creator: @4markie 4markie
item.description:
@4markie wrote:

[quote=“runescape sucks, post:12, topic:396827”][quote author=4markie link=topic=493989.msg3611524#msg3611524 date=1306630054]

Picture of Compiling Error: http://prntscr.com/1ydfl

On the Char files its called: pk-points

Use this command

if (playerCommand.startsWith("dharoks")) { if(pk-points >= 600){ c.getItems().addItem(4716, 1); c.getItems().addItem(4718, 1); c.getItems().addItem(4720, 1); c.getItems().addItem(4720, 1); c.pk-points <= 600; } if(c.pk-points > 200){ c.sM("You do not have enough pk points to get this item"); } }

You have no idea what you’re doing,

This makes no sense

And also that code will only send the message if you have over 200 points when the item costs 600
[/quote]
I didn’t notice the 200 points thing, and i thought thats how it was setup.
The 200/600 points was there already[/quote]

Sorry if I offended you in any way.

Is there anyway you could give me your Commands.java and player.java?

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Command Help
item.dc:creator: @4markie 4markie
item.description:
@4markie wrote:

[quote=“aquikzebra, post:5, topic:396827”]It says "Cannot find Symbol, and points to the p, in pkpoints,

if (playerCommand.startsWith("dharoks")) { if(pk-points >= 600){ c.getItems().addItem(4716, 1); c.getItems().addItem(4718, 1); c.getItems().addItem(4720, 1); c.getItems().addItem(4720, 1); pk-points -= 600; } if(pk-points < 200){ sM("You do not have enough pk points to get this item"); } }[/quote]

I don’t know if I could help you with that, as I don’t know what you named your int for pk points.

Read full topic
